statements: SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalHealthData WHERE country_name = 'USA';
SELECT city_name, temperature FROM EnvironmentalHealthData WHERE pollution_level > 50 ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS average_temp FROM EnvironmentalHealthData WHERE country_name = 'Canada';
SELECT city_name, public_health_issue FROM EnvironmentalHealthData WHERE public_health_issue LIKE '%pollution%' ORDER BY city_name ASC;
SELECT country_name, city_name, pollution_level FROM EnvironmentalHealthData WHERE pollution_level < 20 AND temperature > 25;
SELECT country_name, city_name, pollution_level, temperature, public_health_issue FROM EnvironmentalHealthData WHERE pollution_level > 50 ORDER BY temperature DESC, city_name ASC
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalHealthData WHERE pollution_level < 30 AND temperature BETWEEN 25 AND 30
SELECT city_name, temperature FROM EnvironmentalHealthData WHERE country_name = 'USA' AND public_health_issue IS NOT NULL
SELECT country_name, AVG(temperature) AS average_temperature FROM EnvironmentalHealthData GROUP BY country_name
SELECT DISTINCT country_name FROM EnvironmentalHealthData
SELECT * FROM environmental_factors WHERE factor_id = 1;
SELECT factor_name, factor_value FROM environmental_factors WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM public_health_issues WHERE cases_reported > 1000;
SELECT issue_name FROM public_health_issues WHERE country = 'Canada' ORDER BY issue_name ASC;
SELECT factor_name, factor_value FROM environmental_factors WHERE factor_id IN (2, 4, 6) ORDER BY factor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM environmental_factors WHERE factor_id > 10 ORDER BY factor_value DESC;
SELECT factor_name, factor_value FROM environmental_factors WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM public_health_issues WHERE cases_reported BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY country ASC, issue_name DESC;
SELECT country, SUM(cases_reported) AS total_cases FROM public_health_issues GROUP BY country HAVING total_cases > 500;
SELECT factor_id, factor_name, factor_value, country FROM environmental_factors WHERE factor_value < 0.5 AND country <> 'Canada';
SELECT * FROM Environmental_Factors WHERE id = 1
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM Environmental_Factors ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT disease, cases FROM Public_Health WHERE deaths > 10
SELECT AVG(temperature), AVG(humidity) FROM Environmental_Factors
SELECT * FROM Correlations ORDER BY correlation_coefficient
SELECT * FROM Environmental_Factors
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM Environmental_Factors WHERE temperature > 25

SELECT Public_Health.disease, Correlations.correlation_coefficient FROM Public_Health JOIN Correlations ON Public_Health.id = Correlations.public_health_id WHERE Correlations.correlation_coefficient > 0.5
SELECT disease, cases, deaths FROM Public_Health WHERE cases > 100 ORDER BY deaths DESC
SELECT Environmental_Factors.id, temperature, pollution_level FROM Environmental_Factors WHERE pollution_level < 0.5
SELECT * FROM countries;
SELECT factor_name, factor_description FROM environmental_factors;
SELECT issue_name, issue_description FROM public_health_issues WHERE issue_id = 3;
SELECT country_name, correlation_value FROM countries JOIN correlations ON countries.country_id = correlations.country_id;

SELECT factor_name, issue_name FROM environmental_factors JOIN correlations ON environmental_factors.factor_id = correlations.factor_id JOIN public_health_issues ON correlations.issue_id = public_health_issues.issue_id ORDER BY factor_name DESC;
SELECT factor_name, factor_description FROM environmental_factors
SELECT issue_name, issue_description FROM public_health_issues ORDER BY issue_name ASC
SELECT country_name FROM countries WHERE country_id = 1
SELECT factor_name, issue_name, correlation_value FROM correlations WHERE correlation_value > 0.5 ORDER BY correlation_value DESC
SELECT * FROM environmental_factors JOIN correlations ON environmental_factors.factor_id = correlations.factor_id
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalFactors ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT country_code, humidity FROM EnvironmentalFactors WHERE pollution_level > 50;
SELECT population, average_age, birth_rate FROM PopulationStatistics WHERE country_code = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM ResearchData ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT result_id, correlation_score FROM DataMiningResults WHERE significance_level < 0.05;
SELECT country_code, temperature, humidity FROM EnvironmentalFactors WHERE country_code = 'USA';
SELECT disease, death_rate, recovery_rate FROM HealthIssues ORDER BY death_rate DESC;
SELECT country_code, population, average_age FROM PopulationStatistics WHERE average_age > 30 ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT research_id, topic, publication_date FROM ResearchData ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT result_id, correlation_score, significance_level FROM DataMiningResults WHERE correlation_score > 0.5 ORDER BY correlation_score DESC;
